sqls.sql: select * from GroupNotice where groupId=#{groupId} order by id desc limit 0,1
select u.id as userid,u.imgUrl,u.groupId,u.tel,u.name as username,u.groupAuth,g.groupName,g.createTime from user u,group_ g where u.groupId=g.id and g.id=#{groupId} order by u.groupAuth
select a.*,b.name as userName,b.imgUrl as userImgUrl from GroupJournalComment a join user b on a.userid=b.id where journalId = #{journalId} and context='_Fabulous_' order by a.id

(select a.visitCustomId,a.visitProject,DATE_FORMAT(a.visitTime,'%c月%e日') as visitTime,b.name as customname from usertrip a join custom b on a.visitCustomId = b.id where a.userid in(select id from user where groupid = #{groupId}) and visittype='增员' and visitproject in('面谈报名','受训','结训','上岗','关系建立')) UNION (select testedcustomid as visitCustomId,DATE_FORMAT(testtime,'%c月%e日') as visitTime,testedname as customname,'性向测验' as visitProject from test_resultlog where testedcustomid in (select distinct a.visitCustomId from usertrip a where a.userid in(select id from user where groupid = #{groupId}) and visittype='增员' and visitproject in('面谈报名','受训','结训','上岗','关系建立') )) order by visitCustomId,visitTime
select a.*,b.name as userName,b.imgUrl as userImgUrl from GroupJournalComment a join user b on a.userid=b.id where journalId = #{journalId} and context <> '_Fabulous_' order by a.id
select * from GroupTrip where groupId=#{groupId} order by id

select a.id,a.testTime,a.testedName,a.score,b.name as testerName from test_resultlog a,user b where a.testerUserId = b.id
and a.testedName like '%${testedName}%'
and b.name like '%${testerName}%'
order by a.id desc
select * from grouptrip where groupId = #{groupId} and case when startDate is null or startDate ='' then endDate=#{date} else #{date} between startDate and endDate end
select * from grouptrip where groupId = #{groupId} and case when startDate is null or startDate ='' then endDate=#{date} else #{date} between startDate and endDate end
